title: Cockroach Poker
tagline: The social bluffing game of creepy critters!
loading_info: This can be 30-40s on first boot. Thanks for waiting!

lobby.title: Game Lobby
lobby.invite_body: At least three players are needed to start the game.

game.host_can_restart: Your host can restart a new round.
game.no_one_to_pass_to: There are no players left to pass to, so you must make a prediction.
game.pass_it_on: Now it's your turn to pass it on!
game.confirm_pass: Ready to pass. Click submit to confirm.
game.is_going_to_pick: is going to pick a card from their hand with a claim and a player to pass it to.
game.all_other_winners: All other players are joint winners!
game.going_to_pick_claim_and_player: going to pick a *claim* and *player* to pass the card to.
game.due_to_predict_or_pass: due to *predict* the claim's truthfulness, or peek and *pass* it on.
game.since_all_seen: Since all other players have seen the card

player.host_prompt: To host the game, please choose a player name first:
player.join_prompt: To join the game, please choose a player name first:
player.empty_name_error: Can't have an empty player name
player.name_taken_error: Somebody is already using that name

prediction.correct: You correctly predicted {{player}}'s claim, so {{player}} collects the card
prediction.incorrect: You incorrectly predicted {{player}}'s claim, so you collect the card
prediction.they_correct: {{predictor}} correctly predicted your claim, so you collect the card
prediction.they_incorrect: {{predictor}} incorrectly predicted your claim, so {{predictor}} collects the card
prediction.other_correct: {{predictor}} correctly predicted {{claimed}}'s claim, so {{claimed}} collects the card
prediction.other_incorrect: {{predictor}} incorrectly predicted {{claimed}}'s claim, so {{predictor}} collects the card
